effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.scarlet_violet: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast sea of fire appears.
